Posts.EditableText: I like the look of quest, as it seems user friendly and intuitive. However, is there a mobile app? I think it would be a helpful feature to create your own stories on the go.
Posts.HTML: I like the look of quest, as it seems user friendly and intuitive. However, is there a mobile app? I think it would be a helpful feature to create your own stories on the go.

Posts.EditableText: No, there is not a Quest app. There is the Online Quest, Desktop Quest, and Squiffy. You are also allowed to upload games made from other programs on here. I don't know how though. Mostly it's just html and Inform.
Posts.HTML: No, there is not a Quest app. There is the Online Quest, Desktop Quest, and Squiffy. You are also allowed to upload games made from other programs on here. I don't know how though. Mostly it's just html and Inform.

Posts.EditableText: There's an extremely satisfying feeling about finishing a video game quest and receiving your reward you can search on google play for quest apps
Posts.HTML: There's an extremely satisfying feeling about finishing a video game quest and receiving your reward you can search on google play for quest apps

Posts.EditableText:
This would be nice for someone to start developing though. Maybe as Quest 5.8 and beyond gets created, someone should take over the mantle of turning Quest games into Apps :D That would be fantastic!

Anonynn.
